assium Chloride, Dextrin, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Saccharomyces Ferment Filtrate, Punica Granatum Flower Extract , Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Anthemis Nobilis

l, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil
